page.title: 04TRANSPORT SYSTEMS IN RHOOSE
page.content: It is a source of consternation for the people of S.Glamorgan that now the airport has developed into a going concern, the present Tory government has decided to sell it off in line with its plans to develop Stansted. From{figures}available up to{1974}it can be seen that at the start of the expansion in{1969/70 125,017 {passengers}were catered for. This figure rose by more than{100%}to {275,888 in 1974. Facilities are first class and up to {1,300 cars}can be held in the carpark. A new cargo building has been built. Main destinations are to holiday resorts in{continental Europe.}During the Summer months{Boeing 747's}fly direct to{Canada and N.America}every week. A further extension should be completed by the early 1990's.
